squidpony.squidgrid.libgdx

Class SGPanelGDX

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • squidpony.squidgrid.libgdx.SGPanelGDX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable

    @Beta
public class SGPanelGDX
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
    A libGDX implementation of SPanel that allows both text and graphics.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
